product_overview: Betterish is a modern task management and productivity application designed to help users stay organized and regain time for what they love through intelligent task organization, AI assistance, and personalized productivity coaching.
core_goals: Provide a secure and seamless user authentication and profile management system.
Enable comprehensive task management including creation, editing, deletion, categorization, priorities, and bulk operations.
Support advanced project management with subtasks, project detection, breakdown, and progress tracking.
Incorporate AI-powered features for task suggestions, mentor check-ins, voice transcription, and intelligent task breakdown.
Deliver a mobile-optimized, responsive interface with offline support and optimized touch interactions.
Ensure real-time synchronization and secure data handling using Firebase services.
Facilitate an engaging user experience with onboarding, daily workflows, and productivity coaching.
Offer administrative and debugging tools for maintenance and development.
key_features: User Authentication & Profile Management with Firebase Authentication and preferences setup.
Centralized Task Management system with CRUD operations, validation, and normalization.
Advanced Project Management featuring project detection, subtask handling, and progress tracking.
Smart Task Features including Past Promises, Task Restoration, Snoozing, Dismissal, Recurring Tasks, and AI-based Smart Suggestions.
AI Assistant Capabilities such as AI Mentor Check-ins, Sidekick Chat, Task Breakdown, and Voice Transcription using OpenAI API.
Emergency Mode for focused task management in high-pressure situations.
Mobile-optimized UI with responsive design, touch interactions, offline support, and mobile-specific task forms.
Real-time data synchronization through Firebase Firestore and secure session management.
Administrative Functions including user and data management tools.
Debug Interface and Developer Tools for monitoring and improving application state.
Additional features such as Pattern Tracking, Event Management, Pull-to-Refresh mobile synchronization, and Loose Ends management.
user_flow_summary: User registration and login via email/password authentication.
Initial onboarding flow to set user preferences and introduce dashboard features.
Daily usage involving dashboard overview with greeting, streak info, and active tasks/projects review.
Task creation, editing, completion, or deletion actions with immediate feedback and updates.
Interaction with AI mentor for personalized productivity coaching and task assistance.
Mobile users accessing a tailored, responsive interface optimized for touch and gestures.
Review and management of past promises and recurring tasks.
Use of emergency mode during high-pressure periods for focused task execution.
Administrative users performing cleanup and user management functions.
Debugging and monitoring app states via developer tools when needed.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication, profile creation, and session management without security issues.
All task CRUD operations perform correctly with data validation and synchronization.
Project management features correctly create, manage subtasks, and accurately reflect progress.
AI integrations respond appropriately and provide relevant, context-aware assistance.
Mobile interface adapts responsively with proper touch gesture support and offline capabilities.
Data consistency maintained across devices and sessions with real-time synchronization.
Administrative endpoints perform cleanup and management tasks without errors.
Emergency mode activates and limits tasks as specified under high-pressure scenarios.
Performance goals met with optimized UI responsiveness and bundle sizes.
Security policies and GDPR considerations fully implemented with no data leaks or unauthorized access.
User onboarding and daily workflows proceed smoothly supporting user retention and feature engagement.
